description: This file appears to be a Python source file that generates code for JSON-RPC emitters, including methods for emitting functions, registering/deregistering RPC handlers, and managing namespaces, according to a schema. It contains functions for emitting C++ code snippets for RPC operations based on JSON schema data.

methods.name: EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False)
methods.description: Generates code for emitting a JSON-RPC event handler function, including parameter serialization and callback registration.

methods.name: _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])
methods.description: Generates the prologue part of the RPC source code, including includes, namespace declarations, and class definitions.

methods.name: _EmitRpcEpilogue(root, emit, ns)
methods.description: Generates the epilogue closing parts of the RPC source code, including closing namespace blocks.

methods.name: _EmitVersionCode(emit, version)
methods.description: Generates versioning definitions within the code.

methods.name: _EmitRpcCode(root, emit, ns, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Main function to generate the RPC registration code for a given schema, includes handling of methods, notifications, and events.

methods.name: EmitRpcCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Coordinates generation of full RPC source code including prologue, main code, and epilogue.

methods.name: EmitRpcVersionCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Generates version-specific code for RPC implementations.

methods.name: _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")

ctags.name: EmitEvent
ctags.pattern: /^def EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False):$/

ctags.name: _EmitRpcPrologue
ctags.pattern: /^def _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = []):$/
ctags.signature: (root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])

ctags.name: _Invoke
ctags.pattern: /^            def _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", re/
ctags.signature: (params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")
